• Premiun Coffee Brands •

Coffee Shop is the place where you can get flavorful coffee strains from global elite brands and roasters at very affordable price.

Coffee Shop is just that. What began as an idea and as two individuals’ desire to love what they did for a living has quickly turned into some stomping ground for people and cultivate an environment of ideal-seeking. Giving back to and servicing the community is the foundation of Birch’s philosophy. We care for people first and coffee is a very close second.
